name: iMemory Jogatina HD
description:
The best free iMemory app for kids!

iMemory Jogatina was designed to stimulate learning, as well as the logic and the creativity of the children while they have fun!

Just download, click and start playing on your iPhone and iPad! It's FREE.

* * * * *

- Thematic Sound effects: the player plays and learns to identify the sound of each animal.
- Fast and dynamic gameplay.
- Play without limits: you can play as many times as you want.
- Thematic animal, numbers and geometric shapes pieces
- 3 difficulty levels: Easy, Medium and Hard, challenging the player to be the best

* * * * *

Install this free iMemory app now on your iPhone and iPad!

iMemory Jogatina was part of everyone's childhood. Its role in education is extremely important, because even though it is fun, it allows the player to exercise several mental aspects such as memory, logical reasoning, creativity and competitive spirit.

Play now!

Discover other Jogatina apps!
